casebody.data:
Steven Lamont WILLIAMS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Kirstin B. Coffin, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Steven Lamont Williams' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 902, 172 A.3d 883 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
